languages.text: {n}Лицо регента покрывается бурыми пятнами.{/n} "Мы не желаем обсуждать грехи Вольного Торговца — не здесь и не сейчас. То, что {name} фон Валанциус {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}принял{mf||а} сторону нижайших предателей Дома{/d} {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g} и изничтожил{mf||а} нашего брата Теобальда Триждыпроходца... Мы готовы забыть в обмен на твое спасение, дитя. Идем же, пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо регента покрывается бурыми пятнами.{/n} "Мы не желаем обсуждать грехи Вольного Торговца — не здесь и не сейчас. То, что {name} фон Валанциус принял{mf||а} сторону нижайших предателей дома {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g} и изничтожил{mf||а} нашего брата Теобальда Триждыпроходца... Мы готовы забыть в обмен на твое спасение, дитя. Идем же, пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Reddish brown splotches cover the regent's face.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time or the place. That {name} von Valancius chose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}side with the most despicable renegades{/d} among the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... Well, we will overlook that in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо регента покрывается бурыми пятнами.{/n} "Мы не желаем обсуждать грехи Вольного Торговца — не здесь и не сейчас. То, что {name} фон Валанциус {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}принял{mf||а} сторону нижайших предателей Дома{/d} {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g} и изничтожил{mf||а} нашего брата Теобальда Триждыпроходца... Мы готовы забыть в обмен на твое спасение, дитя. Идем же, пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".

traits.locale_text: {n}The regent's face gets covered with brownish splotches.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time and not the place. The fact {name} von Valancius chose to side with the most despicable renegades among {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... We will let this slide this in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we depart to your new home so we can finish what we started."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The regent's face gets covered with brownish splotches.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time and not the place. We will let this slide this in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we depart to your new home so we can finish what we started."

That {name} von Valancius chose to side with the most despicable renegades among the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... Well, we will overlook that in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}摄政王的脸上渗出了红褐色的斑点。{/n}“那个叫{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯的家伙，选择{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}站在{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}最卑劣的叛徒那一方{/d}，导致我们的兄弟‘开拓者’西奥巴德不幸身亡。不过，我们并不打算讨论行商浪人的罪行，现在不是时候，这里也不是合适的地方。可以这么说，我们愿意忽略这件事情，以此换取你平安无事，孩子。好了，来吧，是时候动身去你的新家了。这样一来，我们来这里的目的，就可以实现了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Reddish brown splotches cover the regent's face.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time or the place. That {name} von Valancius chose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}side with the most despicable renegades{/d} among the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... Well, we will overlook that in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: {n}摄政王的脸上渗出了红褐色的斑点。{/n}“那个叫{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯的家伙，选择站在{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}家族最卑劣的叛徒那一方，导致我们的兄弟‘开拓者’西奥巴德不幸身亡。不过，我们并不打算讨论行商浪人的罪行，现在不是时候，这里也不是合适的地方。可以这么说，我们愿意忽略这件事情，以此换取你平安无事，孩子。好了，来吧，是时候动身去你的新家了。这样一来，我们来这里的目的，就可以实现了。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Unas manchas de color marrón rojizo cubren la cara del regente.{/n} «No tengo intención de hablar de las transgresiones de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. No es ni el lugar ni el momento adecuado. El que {name} von Valancius eligiera {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}apoyar a los renegados más deleznables{/d} de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} y causara la muerte de nuestro hermano Theobald Tres Veces Pionero... es algo que ignoraré a cambio de haberte rescatado, pequeña. Es hora de que partas para tu nuevo hogar, para terminar lo que hemos empezado».
languages.original_text: {n}Reddish brown splotches cover the regent's face.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time or the place. That {name} von Valancius chose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}side with the most despicable renegades{/d} among the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... Well, we will overlook that in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: {n}Unas manchas de color marrón rojizo cubren la cara del regente.{/n} «No tengo intención de hablar de las transgresiones de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. No es ni el lugar ni el momento adecuado. El que {name} von Valancius eligiera apoyar a los renegados más deleznables de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} y causara la muerte de nuestro hermano Theobald Tres Veces Pionero... es algo que ignoraré a cambio de haberte rescatado, pequeña. Es hora de que partas para tu nuevo hogar, para terminar lo que hemos empezado».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}摂政の顔を赤茶色の斑点が覆っている。{/n}「自由開拓者の罪について議論するつもりはない…今はそれにふさわしい場所でも時期でもない。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}の中で{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}最も卑劣な反逆者の側につく{/d}ことを選び、我々の兄弟であるシオボールド・スライス＝パイオニアを死に至らしめたことは…我々はお前の無事と引き換えに、それを見過ごすことにしよう、我が子よ。さあ、そろそろお前の新しい家へ出発する時だ。始めたことを終わらせるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Reddish brown splotches cover the regent's face.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time or the place. That {name} von Valancius chose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}side with the most despicable renegades{/d} among the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... Well, we will overlook that in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: {n}摂政の顔を赤茶色の斑点が覆っている。{/n}「自由開拓者の罪について議論するつもりはない…今はそれにふさわしい場所でも時期でもない。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}の中で{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}最も卑劣な反逆者の側につく{/d}ことを選び、我々の兄弟であるシオボールド・スライス＝パイオニアを死に至らしめたことは…我々はお前の無事と引き換えに、それを見過ごすことにしよう、我が子よ。さあ、そろそろお前の新しい家へ出発する時だ。始めたことを終わらせるのだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Rotbraune Flecken bedecken das Gesicht des Regenten.{/n} "Wir wollen nicht über die Verfehlungen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sprechen – falscher Zeitpunkt, falscher Ort. Dass {name} von Valancius mit den {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}verachtenswertesten Abtrünnigen{/d} der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} paktiert und das Dahinscheiden unseres Bruders Theobald Dreifach-Pionier verschuldet hat ... Nun, das werden wir wegen Eurer Rettung übersehen, Kind. Kommt nun, es ist Zeit für die Abreise in Eure neue Heimat, damit wir beenden können, was wir begonnen haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Reddish brown splotches cover the regent's face.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time or the place. That {name} von Valancius chose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}side with the most despicable renegades{/d} among the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... Well, we will overlook that in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rotbraune Flecken bedecken das Gesicht des Regenten.{/n} "Wir wollen nicht über die Verfehlungen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sprechen – falscher Zeitpunkt, falscher Ort. Dass {name} von Valancius mit den verachtenswertesten Abtrünnigen der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} paktiert und das Dahinscheiden unseres Bruders Theobald Dreifach-Pionier verschuldet hat ... Nun, das werden wir wegen Eurer Rettung übersehen, Kind. Kommt nun, es ist Zeit für die Abreise in Eure neue Heimat, damit wir beenden können, was wir begonnen haben."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Le visage du régent se couvre de taches rougeâtres.{/n} « Nous ne souhaitons pas aborder le sujet des transgressions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Ce n'est ni le lieu ni le moment. Était-il seulement imaginable que... {name} von Valancius {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}s'allie aux renégats les plus méprisables{/d} de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} et provoque la chute de notre frère Théobald Tri-Pionnier... ? Eh bien, nous ferons abstraction de cette folie en échange de votre sauvetage, mon enfant. Et maintenant, venez. Il est temps de rejoindre votre nouveau foyer et de finir ce que nous avons commencé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Reddish brown splotches cover the regent's face.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time or the place. That {name} von Valancius chose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}side with the most despicable renegades{/d} among the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... Well, we will overlook that in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage du régent se couvre de taches rougeâtres.{/n} « Nous ne souhaitons pas aborder le sujet des transgressions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Ce n'est ni le lieu ni le moment. Était-il seulement imaginable que... {name} von Valancius s'allie aux renégats les plus méprisables de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} et provoque la chute de notre frère Théobald Tri-Pionnier... ? Eh bien, nous ferons abstraction de cette folie en échange de votre sauvetage, mon enfant. Et maintenant, venez. Il est temps de rejoindre votre nouveau foyer et de finir ce que nous avons commencé. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Naibin yüzünü kırmızımsı kahverengi benekler kaplıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in işlediği suçlar üzerine konuşmak istemiyoruz, zira ne yeri ne zamanı. {name} von Valancius'un {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}son derece aşağılık{/d} bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} ile birlikte saf tutması ve kardeşimiz Büyük Öncü Theobald'ın ölümüne sebep olması... Kurtarılışın nedeniyle bu olayı görmezden geleceğiz çocuğum. Gel şimdi, yeni evine gitmemiz ve başladığımız şeyi bitirmemiz gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}Reddish brown splotches cover the regent's face.{/n} "We do not wish to discuss the transgressions of the Rogue Trader — this is not the time or the place. That {name} von Valancius chose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviRadicals}side with the most despicable renegades{/d} among the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} and caused the demise of our brother Theobald Thrice-Pioneer... Well, we will overlook that in exchange for your rescue, child. Now come, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: {n}Naibin yüzünü kırmızımsı kahverengi benekler kaplıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in işlediği suçlar üzerine konuşmak istemiyoruz, bunun zamanı veya yeri değil. {name} von Valancius'un son derece aşağılık bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} ile birlikte saf tutması ve kardeşimiz Büyük Öncü Theobald'ın ölümüne sebep olması... Kurtarılışın nedeniyle bu olayı görmezden geleceğiz çocuğum. Gel şimdi, yeni evine gitmemiz ve başladığımız şeyi bitirmemiz gerek."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
